title.rendered: Up to double the gigabytes for free in the Vodafone summer promotion

content.rendered:
Summer is practically just around the corner and that usually means a good amount of summer promotions. Vodafone has decided not to wait for the summer season and has already launched the first of these promotions, focused on its prepaid customers.

From the May 23, 2022 through September 30, 2022prepaid customers of the red operator will be able to see how they double for free or add 20 GB more to their data bonus for free.

Up to double the gigabytes for free on Vodafone

The fact that the prepaid segment has fewer clients than the contract segment does not mean that the different operators do not take care of those clients. Vodafone is already in summer mode and it will be these top-up rate customers who will benefit from a extra number of gigabytes to navigate at maximum speed and with fewer worries in the hot season.

Vodafone prepaid summer

This extra mobile data will be available each time the rate is recharged (in Vodafone it is every 28 days), so you will not have to save it from one recharge to another. In fact, the gigabytes not consumed are accumulated for up to three months, so you can save some recharging in between. This bonus of extra gigabytes will be valid until next September 30, so all the recharges you make until then will be discounted with this summer promotion.

The extra gigabytes as a gift vary depending on the rate you have, doubling the data in the cheapest rates, although adding an extra 20 GB in those that include more gigabytesstarting from 100 GB, since doubling them would be practically making unlimited rates.

New conditions for prepaid rates

With these changes applied, the new conditions of the rates are as follows:

Vodafone prepaid rates (summer 2022)

  • Vodafone Prepaid S: 25GB + 25GB extra. 300 minutes to national and international landlines and mobiles to 56 countries. Includes unlimited calls to other prepaid Vodafone. Its price is 10 euros each recharge for 28 days.
  • Vodafone Prepaid M: 50GB + 50GB extra. ​Unlimited national calls and 800 minutes to 55 countries. It also includes unlimited to Romania. 15 euros each recharge for 28 days.
  • Vodafone Prepaid L: 100GB + 20GB extra. Unlimited calls to national landlines and mobiles. It also includes unlimited to Romania. 20 euros recharge every 28 days.
  • Vodafone Prepaid XL: 120GB + 20GB extra. Unlimited calls to national landlines and mobiles. It also includes unlimited to Romania. Its price is 30 euros each recharge for 28 days.
  • Vodafone Prepaid XXL: 150GB + 20GB extra. Unlimited calls to national landlines and mobiles. It also includes unlimited to Romania. 40 euros each recharge for 28 days.

From October 1, everything will be back to normal and recharges will not include the extra gigabytes per recharge, but the ones you have earned before that date will still be available to spend.
